title: Your trusted partner for
description: One workspace for your pipeline, team, and revenue—so you spend less time juggling tools and more time closing.

features.title: Unified pipeline
features.description: Drag-and-drop Kanban boards for every stage—from identified to closed. Filter by owner, project, or date so you see exactly what matters.

features.title: Projects & organization
features.description: Group leads by campaign or initiative. Create projects, assign leads, and track progress in one place.

features.title: Tasks & todos
features.description: Attach tasks and to-dos to leads and deals. Never miss a follow-up with clear deadlines and assignments.

features.title: Deals & revenue
features.description: Track deal value, stage, and currency. See pipeline value at a glance and close with confidence.

features.title: Analytics
features.description: Pipeline and deal analytics so you can spot trends, forecast, and focus on what converts.

features.title: Comments & context
features.description: Add comments and notes to leads. Keep full context for your team without leaving the app.
